message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you can have 10%. We can adjust in the following rounds.
My turn.  How about a more equitable 60/40 split to get us going?
Okay, I'll budge a bit more, but let's get closer to a 55/45 split. This is my final offer before we lose more money.
This is getting ridiculous.  An even 50/50 split is the only fair option. Take it or leave it.
